mean_cn: n.工程师；技师；火车司机；  vt.设计；建造
mean_en: a person whose job involves designing and building engines, machines, roads, bridges, etc.; a person who is trained to repair machines and electrical equipment
sentence: The two engineers are discussing their new building plans.
sentence_trans: 这两个工程师正在讨论新的建筑计划。
word_etyma: engine发动机 + er人 → engineer工程师
